import React from 'react'; import { v4 as uuidv4 } from "uuid" const TableForm = ({ description, setDescription, quantity, setQuantity, price, setPrice, amount, setAmount, list, setList }) => { const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const newItems = { id: uuidv4(), description, quantity, price, amount } setDescription("") setQuantity("") setPrice("") setAmount("") setList([...list, newItems]) } return ( <>
setDescription(e.target.value)} />
setQuantity(e.target.value)} />
setPrice(e.target.value)} />
setAmount(e.target.value)} />
{list.map(({ id, description, quantity, price, amount }) => (
Item description Quantity Price Amount
{description} {quantity} {price} {amount}
))} ); }; export default TableForm;
